citations.narrative:
Four gerbils were found deceased on 10/21/24. An IACUC investigation found that a member of the lab had forgot to
remove the "controlled food" cage card, leading to the animals last being fed on 10/17/2024. The amount of food provided
to the animals by the lab was not sufficient to last the duration of the weekend. The weekend animal care technicians did
observe the animals, but did not see any indications of health concerns.
Research facilities must provide food that is wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity
and nutritive value to maintain all animals in good health. Animals must be fed at least once a day except as dictated by
hibernation, veterinary treatment, normal fasts, or other professionally accepted practices.
Corrective actions have been put in place at the time of inspection, 4/15/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.129(a)  Critical
   
Feeding. 
Four gerbils were found deceased on 10/21/24. An IACUC investigation found that a member of the lab had forgot to 
remove the "controlled food" cage card, leading to the animals last being fed on 10/17/2024. The amount of food provided 
to the animals by the lab was not sufficient to last the duration of the weekend. The weekend animal care technicians did 
observe the animals, but did not see any indications of health concerns.  
 
Research facilities must provide food that is wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity 
and nutritive value to maintain all animals in good health. Animals must be fed at least once a day except as dictated by 
hibernation, veterinary treatment, normal fasts, or other professionally accepted practices. 
 
Corrective actions have been put in place at the time of inspection, 4/15/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
